title: Can anyone give me advice on hoow to deal with early lanes as melee against ranged, iits frustrating
body: i almost always play assassins mid, as thats where i excelt at. however, the problem is my best and the one i main is talon. i have the capacit to get every single cs in the lanene{miss one or 2 ya know out of every 10 waves) but i find it impossible without sacrificing half my hp.  Because i can only take the melee creeps and barely since theres a lux or ori just wating to throw thier endless barage of spells and aas across the lane, poking me out before lvl 5. i take orrupting potion, but i lose all in potential and it only helps me surivie till i can ask for a pre 6 gank to get me rolling. (to be noted once i get a single kill or 2 its dually gg, or after i get lvl 6 i can usually start a snowball with no problem, but lvl 1-4 are my weak spot

replies.body:
I'm usually okay with missing a few CS to keep my HP up. Once I hit level 3-4, I start farming more, and if they ever throw an ability at me, I can dodge it by Eing on to them for a quick trade. After I win the trade (because they were down an important ability), they start to respect me more. Of course, this doesn't work for every matchup.

I like longsword start, just so I can afford to be a bit more aggressive.
thats a smart move, i think ill try it, tho i usually do so anyways with corrupting and it doesnt work as well
